content: until the last stitch resolving gsrs as you reach them work the last stitch turn pull stitch over the needle turning this stitch into gsr stitch increasing short row 1 knit across 17/17/17/19 stitches turn the work pulling the last stitch over the needle working a gsr 2 purl across 8/8/8/10 stitches turn the work pulling the last stitch over the needle working a gsr 3 knit to 1 stitch after previous gsr stitch resolving gsrs as you reach them turn the work pulling the last stitch over the needle working a gsr 4 purl to 1 stitch after previous gsr stitch resolving gsrs as you reach them turn the work pulling the last stitch over the needle working a gsr repeat increasing short row 3&4 until you have only the last stitch on each side to resolve knit across all stitches resolving gsrs as you reach them purl across all stitches resolving gsrs as you reach them 4 ambtastic s favorite vanilla socks © 2021 by amberhastings optional depth increase knit across all heel stitches purl across all heel stitches knit across all heel stitches purl across all heel stitches pick up two stitches on each side of the heel then begin working across the instep stitches you are now working in the round proceed to foot alternatively substitute a fish lips kiss heel pattern by sox therapist purchaseable from this designer here at ravelry slip_stitch heel flap & gusset 1 k1 sl 1 across 28/30/32/36 stitches 2 purl across all stitches repeat row 1&2 of slip_stitch heel flap 14/15/16/18 times for a total of 28/30/32/36 row heel turn 1 knit 14/15/16/18 stitches across the heel ssk k1 turn 2 sl1 p5 p2tog p1 turn 3 sl1 knit to the previous ssk stitch ssk the previous ssk and the next stitch k1 turn 4 sl1 purl to previous p2tog stitch p2tog the previous p2tog stitch and the next stitch p1 turn repeat heel turn row 4&5 until there are no stitches left to purl or knit together gusset pick up 14/15/16/18 stitches along heel flap + 1 stitch at junction of heel flap and instep knit across instep pick up 1 stitch at junction of heel flap and instep pick up 14/15/16/18 stitches along heel flap knit 14/15/16/18 stitches across heel turn place marker this is the bor for the gusset portion knit the heel stitches until you reach the stitches you have picked up now you will knit the picked up stitches through the front loop -- this will make those stitches twisted and help to close gaps 5 ambtastic s favorite vanilla socks © 2021 by amberhastings gusset decreases 1 knit until there are 3 stitches remaining before the instep ssk k1 knit the instep stitches k1 k2tog knit until back of round 2 knit repeat gusset decrease rounds 1&2 until you are back at your cast on stitch number 56/60/64/72 proceed to foot afterthought heel 1 determine where you want the heel placed place marker on
